text.name: Pendant of Reflection
text.description:
{Pendant of Reflection}

Increases your Magic Resistance additionally by 20%.
text.event: Soldiers approach you with talks about a miracle. You are intrigued and follow them. You see a strange sight indeed; a wanderer sitting on top of the fire trap, without any harm. You offer him money in exchange for the secret, but he laughs and vanishes in the air. You see a strange pendant left in the middle of the trap.
